metadata.name: Fusion #1
metadata.description:
Fractal Art Designs are generated using block hashes as a seed. Hash data is applied with a converter algorithm to set the values of the following parameters: 
affining, transformation, selection, color & gradient, XYZ position of each fractal layer, orbital axis, orbital distance, and a custom function. Then AI Diffusion process is applied at the rendering stage.
Hope you like this unique art !
